Celebrate a weekend of love with your best friends and family at a beautiful Chateau with a good dose of holiday feeling and plenty of quality time with the guests who are dear to you. We offer an intimate and unforgettable setting to create bonds that last a lifetime. With more than 800 years of history, we care about the future; which is why we organize all events with close eye on sustainability, with local producers while not forgetting affordability. [Download our information flyer](https://www.chateaubarayre.com/weddings) to find out about our location, our offer and ourselves. 
If you want to know quickly if our offer matches your ideas and budget: we've made our best attempt to summarize it below.

For questions or ideas, contact us by mail ([info@chateaubarayre.com](mailto:info@chateaubarayre.com)) or phone. We're available for a call any weekday (except Wednesdays) between 9:00 and 18:00 EU time. We can make an appointment, but you can also just call us.

**Our Venue & Services**
The 12th century castle, its impressive 17th-century barn and romantic Roman church are surrounded by a large garden with majestic trees. Renovated with an eye for detail and history, overlooking your own green valley, our chateau makes the perfect setting for intimate celebrations. In and around the castle, beautiful spaces abound. We have a fantastic place for every part of your program! 

**Packages & Prices**
We love to host creative organizers that like to bring in and do lots themselves. We are evenly happy to share our expertise and experience to plan your entire wedding, so you can concentrate on those things that matter most to you.

All weddings include: A) privatized use of the castle and terrains, B) two nights of accommodation for 26 guests and C) our drinks service.

"The Creative Organizer" pack: You like to organize and bring in lots yourself!
_Price: €6.700. Drinks service included._

"Let Us Help You" package: You like to program yourself but prefer us to accompany you along the way and align contacts with local suppliers. 
_Price: €10.300. Furniture, deco & wedding planning included._

"The Complete Wedding" package: Everything we think a wedding should include; venue and accommodation, furniture, decoration, photographer, DJ, hair & make-up, flowers, all food included, open bar and wedding planning. All of that for a very attractive fixed price but still with many options to customize within the framework. Have a look under the following link for more information on the [Complete Weekend](https://www.chateaubarayre.com/complete/). 
_Price: €18.800 for 3 days, 2 nights for 26 guests (~€22.300 for 4 days, 3 nights) + €220 per extra guest_

**Accommodation**
Today the castle offers 26 comfortable beds, including a princely 12th-century wedding suite. We are busy renovating the castle! Most probably we'll be able to accommodate 8 additional guests on-site in 2026 - hence 34 in total - and have between 40 and 50 beds available in 2027. Check [our website](https://www.chateaubarayre.com/nearby-accomodation) for an overview of nearby accommodations. 

**Personal & Sustainable**
We are a small personal location. We'll plan the wedding together and accompany you during your day and stay and sometimes even as bartender or chef! That's why we do only a limited number of weddings per season. 
We believe there's no future of love, if we don't show love for our future. Hence, we source the best local and biological and seasonal food in collaboration with parties that share our values of quality and sustainability. We work with a small team of excellent locals that genuinely enjoy what they do and put their heart to it!

Although social media is not in our veins, luckily others posted quite a bunch of pictures! Hence we'd like to invite you to follow our [Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/chateaubarayre/) or [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/chateaubarayre/photos/?tab=albums).

Chateau Fengari is located in the West-South of France very near to the airport of Bordeaux (45min). 

When booking, the entire château is provided minus the main staff area and the chateau and the park of 11 hectares will become your own home for the stay. This means that you will be the only guests at the Chateau during your stay.

You will have access to:
- The sitting room
- The Swimming pool
- Tennis court
- Garden
- Lake
- 2nd Sitting room
- Dining room
- Main terrace with sitting and dining area.
- Barbecue
- kitchen
- 10 bedrooms (Maximum 30 persons)
- Marquee with furniture for 100 people but the marquee can host about 150 people (216m²).

Less than 5 minutes walking distance to the chapel, village shops and a hotel that can host around 30 persons. There are also many cottages close to the chateau to host other people. 
The surrounding area has exceptional forest paths both for walking and biking as well as multiple hidden ponds and blues lakes.

A list of trusted suppliers who are familiar with the Château is available (such as caterers, florists, and photographers…). Additionally, extra services like wedding coordination or all-inclusive packages are offered, all designed to meet your needs and turn your dreams into reality for your big day.

For 2026 / 2027 : 

- During the high season (from June 1st to September 31st), the price for the chateau is 14 800€ for the WE (from Friday 3PM to Sunday 5PM) or 10 800€ from Tuesday 3PM to Thursday 5PM. 
- During mid-season (May 1st to 31st, October 1st  to October 31st), the price is 10 800€ for the WE (from Friday 3PM to Sunday 5PM) or 8 800€ from Tuesday 3PM to Thursday 5PM.   
- During off season (November 1st to April 30th), it is 4 800€  but the swimming pool and the marquee are not available, the maximum number of guests is reduced to 60 instead of 150 during season. 

**Availability for 2026**
For 2026 we are almost fully booked.
Only a few dates remain available:
- Before April 13th
- From April 22nd until  May 1st
- After October 4th

It is possible to ask for additional nights, the price is 2 000€ per night.
As the Chateau Fengari is constantly changing, our prices are subject to change and are valid for 1 month after receipt of this email.

The Château de Thorens, steeped in 1,000 years of history, has belonged to the de Sales family for 500 years.

Comprehensive management of your event is offered.

Total privatisation of the château with 5 rooms, 9 bedrooms that can accommodate around 30 people, all the furniture needed to set the tables (chairs, tables, tablecloths, crockery, bar tables, etc.). Teams take care of cleaning the premises.

Catering service offers a wide choice of menus and will adapt to your desires and the needs of each guest.

For up to 60 guests, the cost of privatisation is 14,900 euros :
- The château is available for private hire from 8am on Saturday morning to 5pm on Sunday evening. You can book on Friday for an additional €3,000.
- 30 hectares
- 30 luxurious and fully equipped beds. Hotels nearby, 15 minutes on foot or 5 minutes by car, and it is possible to arrange shuttles for hotels further away.
- Tables and chairs.
- 5 rooms.
- Help for parking
- A lemon jus for welcoming
- The 220m² pavilion.
- Wedding planner service before, during and, if necessary, after the event.
- The advantage of the château is that there is always a plan B if it rains.
- Security throughout the night.
- Complete cleaning of the château.
- Option to have brunch at the château, 55 euros per person, including crockery, setting up, table and buffet dressing, clearing away and tidying up.

A list of other service providers is available.

Catering is managed in-house.

Dates still available in 2026.

Domaine Les Martins hosts intimate weddings up to 60 people max. 

7 rooms with a capacity of accommodating 14 people. A list of B&B's and hotels is available for guests that cannot stay on-site. 
 
For weddings a minimum 3 days privatization is required and the price for 2026 is 18000€, for the moment in fall 2026 only Sept 13th to 24th is available. Calendar for 2027 is open.

The privatization will include:
- The right to organize a wedding ceremony + wedding reception and dancing and the brunch the next day.
- Accommodations for 14 people (for 3 nights)
- Daily buffet style breakfast for 14 people 
- Daily cleaning of the rooms
 
The wedding events and the brunch the day after will all have to be prepared by a catering company as this service is not offered in house for weddings. 
 
Wedding planning service available to plan all the details for an additional fee. This service will include presenting, coordinating and managing the third party service providers such as catering companies, rental companies, photographers, videographers, florist, cake makers, musicians, dj, hair&make-up…..etc.

Everything necessary for the wedding ceremony and brunch must be rented (chairs, tables, plates, cutlery, glasses….etc). There are companies we work with for this type of rentals.

Pictures of the rooms are available on the Instagram account in the permanent stories.

Specialise in small bespoke weddings with a maximum of 60 guests. Formula offers accommodation for a maximum of 18 people, in 9 double bedrooms all with ensuite bathrooms, included in the price. 15,000 euros for a three night exclusive takeover, usually taken Friday to Monday morning though midweek is also available. Currently 2026 is fully booked every weekend. Good availability for the rest of April, May and June 2027. At these times of year the garden is at its most stunning with roses clambering everywhere! 

A list of recommended suppliers who have been worked with closely for other weddings is available and can quote directly for their services depending on what you want. A variety of caterers who vary in price are recommended - all do tastings, to help your choice. This list is by no means obligatory. The area is renowned for good wines so delivery of great wines to the Chateau can be arranged at very attractive prices. 10% charge for corkage and storage. 

Once dates are decided a visit is strongly suggested to discuss details. Once decided a contract and bank details for payment of the deposit can be sent. 5000 euros required paid at the time of reserving with the balance of 10,000 euros paid 6 weeks before the proposed wedding. At this second payment a 5000 euros fully refundable security deposit is also taken against possible damages (which has never been needed to use) and this would be returned in full once the Chateau is inspected after the wedding.

Small, exclusive wedding venue that hosts just one or two weddings a year. Maximum capacity of 50 guests.

**Les Rivières Gîtes** is a charming French countryside estate in the heart of the Dordogne, offering exclusive use of the 10-acre holiday complex for 7 nights—perfect for relaxed, nature-filled celebrations between late May and the end of September.

**Venue & Accommodation**
Can accommodate up to **37 guests** across **five fully equipped, self-contained gîtes**, all with private gardens. The entire site is for exclusive use and includes a swimming pool, games room, fishing lake and more.

**Sleeping arrangements:**
- **Lidoire** – Sleeps 5: 1 double, 1 triple room, 1 bathroom
- **Valette** – Sleeps 5: 1 double, 1 triple room, 1 bathroom
- **Martrieux** – Sleeps 8: 3 doubles, 1 twin, 3 bathrooms
- **Lizonne** – Sleeps 7: 2 doubles, 1 triple, 2 bathrooms
- **Beuronne** – Sleeps 12/13: 3 doubles, 2 family rooms (double + single), 1 twin, 3 bathrooms
- Some rooms are on the ground floor, ideal for guests with reduced mobility.

**Bedding, 1 large and 1 small towel per guest** provided, and **end-of-stay cleaning** is included.

**Wedding Day**
Vows can be exchanged in the **woodland clearing**, followed by **reception drinks and lawn games**, then a **wedding breakfast under the covered terrace**, which can seat up to 40 and be styled to your theme. A bar area next door can be stocked by you—with local wines and beer on tap (30L or 20L barrels available).
The evening can continue with a **disco or live band** under festoon lights into the early hours (no curfew!).

**Activities & Extras**
- Optional activities: **wine tasting, canoeing, tree climbing**, etc.
- **Pizza party** night: build-your-own pizzas cooked in original bread oven, followed by desserts and marshmallows around the firepit (25€/adult, 17€/child).
- **Family-friendly**: playground, trampoline, toys, games room, stair gates, cots, highchairs.

**Wedding Services**
Trusted local suppliers to make planning simple:
- **Catering**: From formal 3-course meals to BBQs and sharing platters (approx. 50–70€/head).
    - L'Amandine: [restaurant-traiteur-dordogne.fr](http://www.restaurant-traiteur-dordogne.fr/)
- **Restaurants for group meals** can be arranged nearby
- **Wine & beer**: [la-cavepicerie.com](http://www.la-cavepicerie.com/) (English spoken)
- **Florist**: Oya Fleurs, Villebois Lavalette – excellent value and quality
- **Hair & Makeup**: @weddinghairdordogne / @magali\_laville / @virginie.e
- **Photography**: [laurenknuckey.com](http://www.laurenknuckey.com/) or [zamparo.fr](http://www.zamparo.fr/)

**Travel**
- **By car**: 6 hrs from Brittany ports, 9 hrs from Calais
- **By plane**: Airports nearby (approx. 2 hrs): Bergerac, Bordeaux, Poitiers, Limoges, La Rochelle
- **By train**: Paris to Angoulême (30 mins from us)
    - Car hire or group coach transfers available (coach ~€900 return for 25 people)
- **9-seater vans** available from local Super U supermarket

**Wedding Cake:** Can be ordered from local patisseries or the boulangerie makes a lovely profiterole tower. If you bring your own baker, they're welcome to use the kitchen.

**Wedding Package – £12,500**
_Available May, June, and September 7 nights_

**Includes:**
1. Accommodation for up to 37 guests + babies in 5 gîtes
2. Exclusive use of the property, gardens, pool & amenities
3. Support from Nicky & Richard to set up and liaise with suppliers
4. A 2-night recce stay for 2 people to plan the event
5. Use of trestle tables, grey bistro chairs, crockery, glasses and cutlery.
6. Wedding arch and portable PA system if needed
7. Extra fridges, catering kitchen for the chefs, charcoal BBQs
8. Large marquee if needed for food service
9. Garden games like giant Jenga and Molkky

The best time to have your wedding would be around May or June. It is normally too cold to host in autumn months. Can host a wedding for up to 50 guests. This is the maximum that can comfortably be seated for the meal. 

If there are more guests than accommodated onsite (more than the 37), then there are a couple of additional charges. These are the rental of extra chairs (around £300) and the rental of a small toilet block (around £1000)

Contact: **+33 5 53 56 66 17**

**Availability**
Availability for June 2027:

Wednesday 16 - Wednesday 23 June, or
Wednesday 23 - Wednesday 30 June

Availability also exists early July or September.

The package works as a week booking with flexible wedding day selection during the stay. The standard arrangement is Wednesday to Wednesday stay with the wedding on the Saturday, but this is completely flexible. The week's stay allows guests to relax before the wedding, feel at home, do wedding setup, and then recover and chill out afterward. The Mill is available for any pre- or post-wedding events such as day trips, dinners, night before and day after events.

A 3 night package is also available.

**Prices**
Two different package options are available:

_Wedding Package_ (most popular) - EUR 14,000
Includes: venue and accommodation for the week, wedding planner services, hire of all furniture, use of all decor, flowers for the tables plus bouquets and buttonholes, a registered officiant to help plan and run the wedding ceremony (note this is not a legal ceremony), use of professional sound system, full setup and clean up services.

_Venue Hire_ option - EUR 8,000
Includes: the venue and accommodation for 3 nights, hire of all furniture, help with supplier recommendations, and an onsite caretaker for the wedding.

More details on both packages available in the wedding brochure: [www.moulindechazotte.com/weddings](http://www.moulindechazotte.com/weddings)

Instagram: [instagram](https://www.instagram.com/moulindechazotte/)

**Caterers and Other Suppliers**
Prices do not include other suppliers (caterers, photographer, entertainment etc.) as these elements allow couples to tailor their day. The Wedding Package includes a dedicated wedding planner who can help source all suppliers and get the best deals. The venue works with lots of great local and further flung suppliers and can recommend quality, reliable caterers, photographers, entertainment, hair and make-up artists. The Venue Hire option provides complete flexibility to source all suppliers and materials.

**Guest Numbers**
Maximum capacity: 60 guests for the wedding day.

**Accommodation**
20 guests can be accommodated onsite at the mill (included in both packages). Accommodation is split across four gites or cottages. Exclusive use of the venue is included for the duration of stay, including the pool, bar and the barn. More information on the gites and setup available on the [website](https://www.moulindechazotte.com/our-gites). For additional guests, nearby accommodation can be recommended and transport for the wedding day arranged if needed.

**Location**
Located in the Dordogne in the heart of a wine-producing estate with a magnificent 12th-century Château.
20 minutes from Bergerac airport and 1h30 from Bordeaux Airport.

**Venue Areas**
Different areas on the property, each with its own charm. The grounds of the Château can be used as a private outdoor venue including: the front of the Château, the back of the Château, a terrace on the side of the Château, and a large courtyard surrounded by the outbuildings.
Cost: €2000 for 72 hours for exclusive use of these outdoor areas.

Indoor room in the château with 18th-century wood paneling, measuring just over 80 square meters, all on one level. Opens onto the château's terrace and can accommodate around 80 people.
Cost: €1200.

**Accommodation**
The property has 3 gites:
- 1 gite for 8 people
- 2 gites for 2 people
Total: 12 persons + 4 extra beds

Bedrooms are for 2 people, each with its own bathroom. Bed linen and towels are provided.
Minimum stay: two nights to seven nights depending on the date of the wedding.
Rates vary according to the period and year:
- Large gites: around 440 euros per night
- Smaller gites: 143 euros per night

Surrounding area has several charming gites that can accommodate additional guests.

**Service Providers**
No imposed service providers; couples can make their own choice and organize their wedding.

**Offer**
- Exclusive venue letting for the time of the wedding (on average two or three nights but there is no rule)
- Accommodation in 15 bedrooms (more available in the village if needed)
- Breakfast service
- Assistance to bride and groom to select suppliers (wide address book available)

**Availability**
Possible dates run from the end of May through early October as the gardens are an important part of the wedding scene and take time to be ready.

**Rates**
